feature1Title.en: Find the best prices across multiple chains.
feature1Title.zh: 发现不同链上最好的价格

feature1Detail1.en: Aggregate liquidity sources across leading DEXs.

feature1Detail2.en: Discover the most efficient trading routes.
feature1Detail2.zh: 智能化推荐最有效的交易路线

feature1Detail3.en: Trade safely with no limits and hidden fees.
feature1Detail3.zh: 安全交易没有隐藏费用

feature2Title.en: Trade across chains with one click.

roadmapQ1Detail2.zh: 发布 Neo swap 模块

roadmapQ2Q3Detail1.en: Release O3 Hub, providing cross-chain service.
roadmapQ2Q3Detail1.zh: 上线 bridge 模块，提供跨链服务

roadmapQ2Q3Detail2.zh: Swap 支持 ETH，BSC 网络

roadmapQ2Q3Detail3.zh: 发行 O3 Swap 治理 token 与经济模型

roadmapQ4Detail2.en: Deploy aggregation protocol on Layer 2 networks.
roadmapQ4Detail2.zh: 完成 Layer2 版本开发与部署

roadmapQ4Detail3.en: Complete O3 Hub development across Layer 2 networks.

roadmap2022Detail1.en: Release V2. Support instant quote and pending order.
roadmap2022Detail1.zh: 发布V2，支持即时询价，挂单交易

riskTip.en: O3 Swap is currently in the testing phase. The testing amount is limited to below $20 in USD. Back up your private keys securely and trade at your own risk.
